name: opendevbrowser
description: OpenCode plugin for browser automation via CDP with snapshot-refs-actions workflow

scripts.extension:build: npm run extension:sync && tsc -p extension/tsconfig.json && node scripts/copy-extension-assets.mjs
scripts.extension:pack: cd extension && zip -r ../opendevbrowser-extension.zip manifest.json popup.html dist/ icons/
scripts.prepack: npm run version:check && npm run build && npm run extension:build
